summary_detail.value: Today, Sept 2nd at 8:00 pm, Sheep Gap and Deep Creek will be managed by the Northern Rockies Western Montana Type 2 Incident Management Team under Incident Commander Connel. Sheep Gap and Deep Creek Fires as well as four fires on the Kootenai National Forest will be managed by this team. Updates, Closures and Maps for both Sheep Gap and Deep Creek Fires will be found on this page today.

title: Highway 200 Complex will contain Sheep Gap and Deep Creek (Sheep Gap Wildfire)
